summary:
Replaces the vanilla crosshair with a very small dot (close to a pixel) or (optionally) a small cross.
Additionally the stealth meter has been moved to the lower left.
descriptionHtml:
[size=+1]
[color=red]
[b]This mod is no longer supported!
Please consider using my other mod [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33482]Minimal HUD[/url][/b] which allows you to select and scale crosshairs to your liking via an ingame MCM menu!
[/color]
[/size]

-------------------------------------------------------------------
Minimal Crosshair for Skyrim

[b][u]Last Update 0.13[/u][/b]
- fixed issues with crosshair positions
- made crosshairs semi-transparent to make them less noticable
- made a stealth meter only version
- made a version with basic iHud support*

*The iHud versions support iHuds dynamic crosshair functionality as long as you are not in stealth mode. In stealth mode the crosshair is always visible. When entering/leaving stealth there is a slight delay before the crosshair is shown which might (or might not) get annoying. --> So use this version only if you make use of iHud\'s crosshair functions.

[b][u]Description[/u][/b]
This mod replaces the vanilla crosshair with a very small single dot (close to a pixel) or (optionally) a small cross.
Additionally the stealth meter has been made smaller and moved to the lower left.

The crosshair is [b]always[/b] visible and is [b]not[/b] affected by the skyrim options or iHud.

This mod was made from scratch and does not build on any other mods.
The gerenal idea though was heavily inspired by the following great mods:
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15213]Small Crosshair[/url] by IceKK
- [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/26387]Simple Crosshair[/url] by Shadow771.

[b][u]Installation[/u][/b]
Extract archive to Skyrim/Data folder
